<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>Default GET</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var methodName = request.pathParams.methodName.toString();
	var args = request.queryParams.args.toString().split(',');	
	var gsMethod = gs[methodName];
	return gsMethod ? gsMethod.apply(this, args) : "Invalid method name";
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/488924/gs/{methodName}</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/{methodName}</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description>GlideSystem {methodName} as path param, {args} as query param (comma-separated)</short_description><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jaydeepdeb</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-10-14 13:33:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>360c50a207bf901037c7f2ae7c1ed05e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Default GET</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_360c50a207bf901037c7f2ae7c1ed05e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jaydeepdeb</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-10-14 13:59:54</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="UI GlideSystem">83eb1c6207bf901037c7f2ae7c1ed0d1</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
